projects.title: MS Blaze Laptop - Product Development
projects.description: Led end-to-end product development for a high-performance laptop targeting students and professionals. Managed cross-functional teams, defined requirements, and delivered within budget.

projects.title: DMAIC Quality Improvement Initiative
projects.description: Spearheaded DMAIC (Define, Measure, Analyze, Improve, Control) methodology to reduce production defects by 15% and operational costs by 12% over 6 months.

projects.title: Life Planning Analysis System
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive planning system using data analytics and visualization to optimize life goals and resource allocation. Enhanced decision-making efficiency by 25%.

projects.title: Automated Visual Testing Framework
projects.description: Implemented automated visual testing framework reducing manual testing time by 40%. Integrated with CI/CD pipeline for continuous quality assurance.

projects.title: Building Operations Management
projects.description: Managed operations for 100,000+ sq ft facilities at UT Arlington, overseeing maintenance, vendor coordination, and ensuring optimal building performance.

projects.title: Supply Chain Optimization
projects.description: Optimized supply chain processes and inventory management, contributing to cost savings and improved efficiency in food service operations.
